thread.section_title: Ann Summers Ltd Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.annsummers.com
thread.title: Steve
thread.title_full: Ann Summers Ltd reviewed by Steve

author: Steve
title: Steve
text:
I purchased some goods for a friend of mine as a birthday present. The billing details were mine but the delivery details were clearly that of the recipient. The goods arrived at her office whilst I have no complaints about the goods, they were the right size and looked fantastic on her my name was clearly on the address line alongside hers. Not only did this risk spoiling any surprise the package was meant to offer as to whom sent it but it also could have caused quite the controversy had her colleagues seen it.
Over all I would buy again from you but I would also like you not to put billers details on the delivery address unless specifically instructed to do so.
